summary.title: Resumo do dia em Design
summary.text: O dia trouxe atualizacoes relevantes em design, UX e produto. As principais fontes foram Smashing Magazine, UX Collective, Sidebar. Este resumo sera aprimorado no pipeline diario.

articles.title: Rethinking “Pixel Perfect” Web Design
articles.excerpt: Amit Sheen takes a hard look at the “Pixel Perfect” legacy concept, explaining why it’s failing us and redefining what “perfection” actually looks like in a multi-device, fluid world.

articles.title: How a 2,500-year-old story explains why UX findings get ignored
articles.excerpt: Design’s longest struggle has been around for 55+ years Continue reading on UX Collective »

articles.title: Cold storage
articles.excerpt: Good UX is what companies do when they have to. A company that has your stuff locked away doesn’t have to.

articles.title: Anacyclosis: the cycle of political revolution
articles.excerpt: An interactive visualization of Polybius’s theory of anacyclosis—the cyclical succession of political regimes.

articles.title: Creating your own opportunities
articles.excerpt: The best career opportunities don’t necessarily come from your manager. They come from seeing potential in the boring work already on your plate.

articles.title: I want my MTV
articles.excerpt: Celebrating 44 years of continuous music videos. Stream classic music videos 24/7.

articles.title: Usability heuristics and competition in games
articles.excerpt: When a game’s UI does not meet these expectations, it negatively affects the entire experience. Сompetition drives progress (or burnout).
